totalAmount.description: Total amount, amount unit points, tip: Only integer strings are supported
totalAmount.description_zh: 总金额，金额单位分，tip：仅支持整数型字符串

dealId.description: The financial settlement voucher of Baidu cashier is detailed in the platform terminology for details
dealId.description_zh: 百度收银台的财务结算凭证，详见平台术语

appKey.description: For details about the payment appKey allocated after the payment capability is activated, see Platform Terminology for details
appKey.description_zh: 支付能力开通后分配的支付 appKey，详见平台术语

promotionTag.description: Platform marketing information, here pass the SPUID of the platform coupon that can be used in the current order, and use this parameter in the payment ability;Note: Only developers who cooperate with Baidu platform category coupons need to fill in this parameter
promotionTag.description_zh: 平台营销信息，此处传当前订单中可使用平台券的 spuid，同时需在 支付能力中搭配使用传入该参数；注：仅与百度合作平台类目券的开发者需要填写该参数

enablePageBackModal.description: Whether to set a retention pop-up window

styleType.description: Customize the style and file configuration, and the configuration items of each level include the height of the payment channel/coupon bar, the size of the channel icon, the font size of the payment channel copy, the font size of the marketing copy, and the size of the selector icon
styleType.description_zh: 自定义样式档位配置，各档位配置项包括支付渠道/优惠券条高度、渠道图标大小、支付渠道文案字体大小、营销文案字体大小、选择器图标大小

onGetPaymentInfo.description: Get payment-related information, which is in the detail field of the return value
onGetPaymentInfo.description_zh: 获取支付相关信息，具体信息在返回值的 detail 字段中

onError.description: 当发生错误时触发 error 事件，具体信息在返回值的 detail 字段中，例如 {detail: {errMsg: "something is wrong"}}
onError.description_zh: 当发生错误时触发 error 事件，具体信息在返回值的 detail 字段中，例如 {detail: {errMsg: "something is wrong"}}
